Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class I bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Structure Description: Despite the same chemical features as those observed in cypemycin and grisemycin, legonaridin 1 has a structurally different C-terminus with a free carboxylic acid.
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Legonaridin, a new member of linaridin RiPP from a Ghanaian Streptomyces isolate.
Literature.Author: Rateb ME, Zhai Y, Ehrner E, Rath CM, Wang X, Tabudravu J, Ebel R, Bibb M, Kyeremeh K, Dorrestein PC, Hong K, Jaspars M, Deng H.
